def_cn: (澳大利亚等国的)立法院议员
def_en: In Australia and some other countries, an MLA is a person who has been elected as a member of parliament. MLA is an abbreviation for (缩略 =) 'member of the legislative assembly'.

def_cn: (写在某人姓名之后表示已经当选的)立法院议员
def_en: MLA is written after someone's name to indicate that they have been elected as an MLA.
